1.「俺は 魔獣をあやつり 世界に恐怖と混乱を| もたらした……。弁解の余地もない。: As you know, I was the master of the|Hexabeasts. The bringer of terror and chaos|to the world...

2.「魔獣との戦いに 身を投じてきた お前には| 話しておかねばなるまいな。: Since you've been fighting against me for so|long, the least I can do is give you a full|explanation.

3.「無限獣ネロスゴーグ 喪心獣ゾンテドール| 憑依獣ザルボーグ 増殖獣バイロゴーグ:
Eternal Beast Nerosugog, Mourning Beast|Zontedor, Possessed Beast Zalborg, Multiplying|Beast Biologog... and what those four|
|Hexabeasts are.

4.「かつて 俺は 神墟ナドラグラムで| 竜神の心臓を奪取した。: Once, I seized the Dragon God Heart in the|Nadragram Shrine.

5.「王立アルケミアに隠されていた 特殊な| 魔獣の卵を孵化させるため 竜神の心臓に:
The reason for this was that they needed the|enormous energy contained in the Dragon God|Heart to hatch the eggs of a special magical|
|beast hidden in the Royal Alchemia.

6.「そうして生まれた 魔獣たちに 俺は| アストルティアの歴史に その名を刻む|: To the Hexabeasts born from this, I gave the|abilities of fearsome monsters whose names|were etched into Astoltia's history.

7.「魔獣の能力を成長させ その絶頂期を見計らい| 魔獣ごと 終焉の繭に吸収させるの:
The Timeseer Box... Kyuronos's plan was to|nurture the ability of the Hexabeasts, and at|the peak of their power, have their entire|
|being absorbed into the cocoon of demise.

8.「その計画も お前の活躍により 完璧なものには| ならなかったが……魔獣の肉体を:
And while that plan may not have been|perfected thanks to your efforts... the|lifeform within the cocoon is steadily being|
|perfected by absorbing the bodies of the|Hexabeasts.

9.「そして キュロノスは 繭から羽化した| 生命体に おのが精神を移すことで| 完: And Kyuronos is attempting to give itself a|perfect body by transferring its own soul into|the lifeform that will hatch from the cocoon.

10.「人の世を……世界を終わらせる そのために。: To end mankind... and the entire world.

11.「……キュロノスの支配下にあった 俺は| それを 未来を守るためと 信じ込まされ: Kyuronos tricked me into believing it was to|protect the future, and I was forced to do its|bidding.

12.「実際は そのすべてが| 世界に仇なす行為だった……。: In truth, it was nothing more than an act of|vengeance against the world...

13.「……時獄の迷宮に行き キュロノスを倒す。| それが 罪を重ねてきた 俺にできる: I will go to the Time Prison and defeat|Kyuronos. That's the least I can do to atone|for the many sins I've committed.

14.「また ひとりで 行くつもりなのね。| ムチャよ！ 回復したばかりなんでしょ？: You're going by yourself again. You can't do|this! You just got better, didn't you?

15.「メレアーデ……お前が無事で 安心した。| しかし この時代に 来ていたとは……: Mereade... I am so relieved that you are safe.|But I had no idea you were here in this era...

16.「俺のせいだな……本当に すまない。: It's all my fault... I'm so sorry.

17.「私は……大丈夫よ。いろいろ あったけど……| <pc>に 助けてもらえたから。: I'm... okay. I've been through a lot, but|<pc> helped me through it.

18.「それよりも 叔父様。| 行くなら 私も連れていって。| 何か 手伝えることが: More importantly, Uncle. If you're going, take|me with you. There might be something I can|help you with.

19.「<pc>だって そう思うでしょ？| ふたりで 叔父様を助けましょうよ。: You feel the same, right, <pc>?|Let's both help my uncle.

21.「時空の狭間にある 時獄の迷宮には 一度でも| そこへ到達した者しか 行くことが: The Time Prison, located in the Spacetime Gap,|can only be reached by those who have been|there once before.

22.「いかに 時渡りのチカラが 強かろうと| 時獄の迷宮に入るのは 不可能だ。: No matter how powerful you may be, it is|impossible to enter the Time Prison otherwise.

23.「そんな……どうにか ならないの？| ３人で行ったほうが きっと うまくいくわ。: Is there really no other way? I'm sure it will|work out if the three of us go together.

24.「今は 一刻を争うときだ。: It's a race against the clock.

25.「ただ……マデ神殿になら 時獄へと至る| 特別な方法が あるかもしれない……。|: But... there may be a special way to enter the|Time Prison in Made Temple... though it's only|a legend.

26.「すっかり 世話をかけたな <pc>。| 無事に やりとげたら あらためて礼に来: Thanks for all your help, <pc>.|I'll be sure to thank you properly when I'm|done. Until then, take care of Mereade.

27.「メレアーデも……気持ちだけで 充分だ。| 絶対 マローネを救いだしてみせる。|: And Mereade... your feelings are enough. I|will save Marone, I promise. So...don't worry|too much.

28.「心配するなって 言われても| そんなの……ムリだわ。: Even if you say not to worry... that's|impossible for me.

29.「パドレ叔父様のいう マデ神殿というのは| 王都キィンベルの北西にある 禁足地よ: The Made Temple Uncle Padre mentioned is a|forbidden site northwest of Royal City Kimbel.|It could be our way into the Time Prison.

30.「考えても はじまらないわね。| まずは 王都へ行って マデ神殿に入るには| ど: There's no time to stop and think about it.|First, let's go to the Royal City and try to|figure out how to get into Made Temple.

31.「どうやら 方針は 決まったキュね。| 王都キィンベルを目指して| エテーネルキ: It looks like we've decided on a course of|action, kyu. Ethenel Cube, setting course for|Royal City Kimbel, kyu!

32.「……黒曜の隕石孔には 誰も近づかせるな。| 異変があったら すぐに 知らせろ。: ...No one is allowed near the Meteorite Hole.|If you see anything out of the ordinary, let|me know immediately, no matter how small.

35.「背なんか すっかり 高くなって……| 弟っていうよりも むしろ お兄さんね。: You've gotten so tall... you're more like a|big brother than a little brother.

36.「姉さんは 変わらないな。| 記憶の中の 姉さんのままで うれしいよ。: You haven't changed. I'm glad you're still the|same sister I remember.

37.「エテーネに帰ってから すぐ| 姉さんの捜索を 始めたんだが| 手がかりすら見つ: I started searching for my sister as soon as I|got back to Ethene, but when there was no sign|of her, I was at a loss.

38.「そう…………。心配 かけたみたいね。| あなたは １０年以上も| ウルベア地下: I see... it looks like I made you worry. I|heard you had been living in the Urbea|Underground City for over a decade...

39.「そして……処刑された とも……。| いったい どういうことなの？: And that you... were executed... What|happened?

40.「ああ……こいつのおかげでね。: Yeah... it was thanks to this.

41.「<kyodai>と 俺のために作った| ふたつの エテーネルキューブ……| こ: <kyodai> and the two Ethenel Cubes|they made for me... this is one of them.

42.「あの時 深手を負い 地面に激突する寸前に| こいつが発動して 俺は この時代に: Just before I hit the ground with my grievous|wound, it activated and brought me back to|this time period. It was truly a miracle...

43.「その エテーネルキューブを作るため| グルヤンラシュと名乗って ガテリアの人た: Is it true that you called yourself Guryan|Rush and did terrible things to the people of|Gateria in order to make that Ethenel Cube?

44.「この時代に……エテーネ王国に戻るには| ああするほか 道はなかった。: In that time... there was no other way to|return to the Ethene Kingdom.

45.「弁解しないのね……。| ひとつの国家を 地上から消し去って……| いったい ど: You have nothing to say for yourself...? For|the many lives lost from wiping an entire|nation off the face of the earth?

46.「クオード……ねえ わかってるの？| あなたがやったことの 意味を。: Quard... do you know? Do you even understand|what it is you did?

47.「民の幸せを守る 王になるって| 私に誓ったわよね？ 異国の民になら| 何をした:
Didn't you vow that you would be a king who|would protect the people's happiness? You|can't just do as you please to the people of|
|another country!

48.「……俺を責めて 気がすむのなら いくらでも| 責めればいい。だが どんな犠牲を: Blame me all you want if it makes you feel|better. But no matter what the cost, I|couldn't let myself die in that time.

49.「エテーネ王国を 滅亡から救うまで| 俺は 死ねない！| この命は……エテーネの: I will not die until I have saved the Ethene|Kingdom from destruction! I will use my life|for the good of Ethene.

50.「……そうか。まだ 知らないんだな。| 我が国に迫る 滅びの危機を……。: ...I see. You still don't know. The imminent|doom of our nation...

51.「俺は 未来のウルベア帝国で| この時代 エテーネ王国が 跡形もなく| 水没し: I learned that in the future Urbea Empire,|this period of history, the Ethene Kingdom was|submerged and destroyed without a trace.

52.「原因は 地脈エネルギーの 急激な枯渇に| よるものらしい。そして 今まさに|:
The cause is apparently the rapid depletion of|geothermal energy. And now it has been|confirmed that this is exactly what is|
|happening.

53.「だが エテーネ王家に つらなる者として| 俺は この国を アストルティアの歴史: But as a member of the royal house of Ethene,|I will not let this country be erased from the|history of Astoltia!

54.「国を救うために 帰ってきたんじゃ| ないとすると……| 何か ほかに事情が あ: If you didn't come back to save your|country... is there something else going on?

55.<pc>は クオードに|封印されている マデ神殿に|入るための手段を探していると: <pc> informed Quard that they were|looking for a way to enter the sealed Made|Temple.

56.「マデ神殿……あそこは 王家の祖先によって| 封印された 禁足地だったはず……。:
Made Temple... it's a forbidden place sealed|off by our royal ancestors... if you want to|know more about it, you'll have to search|
|through the ancient documents.

57.「……いいだろう。何か理由があるようだし| 神殿に入る方法は 俺が探そう。| 代:
...Very well. Whatever your reasons, I will|find a way to get you into the temple. But in|exchange, I want your help in preventing the|
|submersion.

58.「……姉さん。| 俺のことを 信用してくれないか？| たしかに この手は 血で汚: Sister... You trust me, don't you? You're|right, there's blood on my hands.

59.「だが エテーネの救済に つながるなら| 約束を たがえたりはしない……。| そ: But I will not renege on my promise if it|leads to the salvation of Ethene, I swear it|on my life!

60.「どうして ウルベアや ガテリアの人たちにも| 今と同じだけの 思いやりを| か: Why couldn't you show the same amount of|compassion to the people of Urbea and Gateria|as you do now...?

61.「メレアーデには 抵抗感があるみたいキュね。| けど クオードと手を組むのが も: Mereade seems to have some reservations, kyu.|But the most efficient way is to join forces|with Quard. There's no time for detours, kyu.

62.「魔法生物を 連れているのか？ <pc>。| お前に そんなシュミがあったとはな: You have a magical creature with you,|<pc>? I didn't know you had an|interest in them.

63.「やれやれキュ～。このボクと 魔法生物の| ちがいすら 見分けられないなんて！|:
Good grief, kyu~! I can't believe he can't|even tell the difference between me and a|magical creature! I really do believe that|
|this man is blind, kyu.

64.「……いいわ。申し出を 受けましょう。| 滅亡のふちに立たされた エテーネを救う: ...Okay. I accept your offer. It is not only|your duty to save Ethene from destruction, but|mine as well.

65.「ただし やるからには 絶対に成功させるわよ！| この国に生きる すべての人たち: But if we're going to do this, it absolutely|must work! Once we have protected the future|of everyone in this country...

68.「さっそくだが 計画の話に移ろう。| まず 王都の自宅にいる ディアンジを訪ね|: Let's discuss the plan right away. First, I|would like you to visit Dianji at his home in|the Royal City and hear what he has to say.

69.「計画には ある錬成物が 必要なんだが……| どうも 苦戦しているようでな。|: I'm in need of a certain alchemical, but I've|been having trouble getting my hands on it.|That's where you come in.

70.「俺のほうは 計画全体を指揮しつつ| マデ神殿への入り方を 調べておく。: I will be overseeing the plan as a whole, and|finding out how to get you into Made Temple in|the meantime.

71.「それと エテーネの滅亡については| 無用な混乱をさけるためにも いっさい| 口: And as for the destruction of Ethene, please|keep it to yourself to avoid any unnecessary|panic. I'm counting on you.

72.「ややっ！？| <pc>さんじゃないですか！| いらっしゃい おひさしぶりですね: Yikes! Isn't that <pc>!? Welcome,|it's been a long time!

74.「まぼろしではないから 安心して。| 私たちは クオードに頼まれて 来たのよ。: It's no mirage. We're here at Quard's request.

75.「クオード様に お会いになったんですか！| さぞや およろこびだったでしょう！！: You met Mr. Quard! He must have been so happy|to see you!

76.「ディ…ディアンジ。いいい いつまで| メレアーデ様を 立たせておくつもりだ。|: Di...Dianji. H-h-how long are you going to|keep Lady Mereade standing? H-h-hurry up and|give her a seat.

77.「おーっと そうでした！？| ささっ。どうぞ おかけになってください。| 今 お: Oops, that's right! Come, come, have a seat.|I'll bring you some tea.

80.「ふたりとも ありがとう。| 以前と変わらず クオードに| 尽くしてくれてるよう: Thank you both. You seem to be as dedicated to|Quard as ever.

81.「はい！ 見た目は すっかり変わられましたが| クオード様は 以前のままですよぅ: Yes! He may look completely different, but|Master Quard is still the same as before. He|is a kind and gentle soul with an honest heart.

82.「ままま…前にも増して くくく国を愛し| 民を思いやるように な…なられた！|:
He has become even more loving to his country|and considerate of the people! It's a sign|that he is becoming more aware of his|
|position as king.

83.「……でででも どこか 遠くに感じる。| 心に何かを ひ…秘めてるような……。: ...B-b-but he feels distant. Like he's|h-hiding something in his heart...

84.「そりゃあ オトナなんですからねぇ。| 私たちにだって 話せないことの| ひとつ: Of course, we are adults, you know. Even we|have one or two things we can't talk about,|don't we?

86.「ディアンジ……| 私たち あなたを手伝うために 来たのよ。: Dianji...we are here to help you.

87.「地脈エネルギーの枯渇で エテーネが水没する。| この危機を どうにかするための:
Ethene is sinking due to the depletion of|geothermal energy. I'm told plans are afoot to|do something about this crisis... but there's|
|some kind of trouble?

88.「……じつは そうなんです。| 私のウデが 未熟なばかりに 計画に必要な| 地脈: ...It's just as you heard. My inexperience|with alchemy is making the creation of a Geode|Crystal for the plan very time-consuming.

89.「できれば 自力で 完成させたかったのですが| この上は どなたか 優秀な錬金術: I had hoped to complete it myself, but now I'm|thinking of asking a more talented alchemist|to do it for me...

90.「できそうな人に 心当たりはあるの？: Can you think of anyone capable of doing it?

91.「う～ん かなり 高度な錬金術ですから| 相当な実力のある 錬金術師でないと……: Well, it is very advanced alchemy, so it must|be a very skilled alchemist... I can't think|of anyone off the top of my head.

92.「そういうことなら 私と <pc>で| 地脈の結晶を 錬金できそうな人を探すわ。: In that case, <pc> and I will find|someone who can alchemise the Geode Crystal.|<pc> is reliable, so don't worry!

93.「おお 手伝ってくださいますか！| ご協力 感謝 感謝ですよぉ。| これで 他に: Oh, you're really going to help? Thank you so|much! Now I can concentrate on preparing the|other things we'll need!

94.「では <pc>さんには| こちらを お渡ししておきますね。: Then I will give you this, <pc>.

95.<pc>は ディアンジから|地脈の結晶のレシピ（だいじなもの）を|受け取った！<: <pc> received|the Geode Crystal Recipe (Key Items) from|Dianji!<me 60>

96.「そのレシピを 錬金術師に見せて| 作れるかどうか 聞いてみてください。: Show that recipe to the alchemist and ask them|if they can make it.

97.「やみくもに探し回るより まずは| この国の 錬金術師の知り合いを 訪ねて| 優:
Instead of blindly searching around, you|should first visit your alchemist|acquaintances in this country and ask them to|
|introduce you to some excellent ones.

98.「……ワグミカさん。考えなおしてください。| あなたの錬金術のウデに 大勢の命と: ...Ms. Wagmika. Please reconsider. Many lives|and the future of the kingdom depend on your|alchemical skills.

99.「フン。どこかで見た カオだと思えば| ドミネウスの 娘っ子か！: Hmm. I've seen this face somewhere, and it's|Domineus' daughter!

100.「国を ほったらかしにして 行方を| くらませていた 王族の小娘ふぜいが| どの: Where do you get off talking to me like that|when you were the one who abandoned your|country and vanished, huh? Hic!

101.「同志 ワグミカ。本日の 農作業のノルマを| 達成いたしました……おっと| 来客: Comrade Wagmika. I have fulfilled my quota for|today's farm work... oh, I didn't know you had|company. Pardon the interruption!

102.「ふるえを治す お薬があるんですよね？| どうか お薬を飲んで 地脈の結晶の錬金: You have medicine that cures tremors, don't|you? Please, take the medicine and try to|alchemise the Geode Crystal.

103.「ぬしの親父のせいで ワシのキャリアは台無し！| なのに 必要になったから 手伝: Your father ruined my career! And now you want|me to help you just because you asked? You've|got some nerve!

104.「ぬしを見てると ドミネウスのクソを| 思いだして 気分が悪くなるわ！| 薬なん: You remind me of that Domineus bastard and it|makes me sick! Who the hell would take that|medicine, anyway? Now, go away!

105.「も…もうしわけないんだモーン。| ご主人も 飲みたくないと 言ってるので| 今: Sorry, mon. Master doesn't want to drink her|medicine, so you'll have to leave for now,|mon.

106.「ワグミカさんには お薬が必要よ。| モモンタルちゃんだって ずっと このままで: Wagmika needs her medicine. Sanguintal, you|don't think she can stay like this forever, do|you?

107.「ワグミカ殿！| 聞こえてますか？ ワグミカ殿！: Miss Wagmika! Can you hear me? Miss Wagmika!

108.「なんてことだ……王立アルケミアに通じる| 秘密の通路の ありかを 聞きにきたと: Geez... I came here to ask about the location|of the secret passage to Royal Alchemia, and|here you are at rock bottom...

110.「しょうのない ご主人なんだモン。| 今 お持ちするんだモーン。: You're so hopeless, Master. I'll go get some,|mon.

111.「あいや。待たれよ モモンタル殿。| クチでは ああ言ってますが ワグミカ殿が|: No, wait, Sanguintal. She may be saying that,|but that's not what Miss Wagmika really needs.

112.「これを お使いください。| 身体じゅうの毒素を抜く 丸薬です。: Use this. It's medicine that removes toxins|from the body.

113.「ちと……いや 超がつくほど 苦いのですが| 健全な身体になれば ワグミカ殿も|: It's a little...well, extremely bitter, but I|think a healthy body will help Miss Wagmika|get out of her self-indulgent lifestyle.

114.「ファ ファラス君……。| かたじけないッ……かたじけないモン！: Mr. Faras... Thank you... thank you!

115.「真に 主が求めるものを見抜き| 主のために 行動できる者こそが 真の従者。|: A true follower is one who can tell what their|lord truly needs, and acts upon it. I hope we|can both live up to that expectation.

116.「フンッ！ 民草のためならば 協力もしよう。| じゃが 相手が王族なら 話は別よ: Hmph! I'm willing to help if it's for the good|of the people, but royalty's a different|story! I won't lift a finger!

117.「あっかん べろべろべぇ～！| ドミネウスの娘よッ！ ぬしも 人生がクソだと|: Nyeh nyeh! Daughter of Domineus! It's time you|learned that life isn't fair! Eeheeheeheehee!

118.「ゴシュジーン！！ 見苦しいモーンッ！| 今すぐ ファラス君のくれた あの薬を飲: MASTER!! You're a disgrace, mon! Now come to|your senses and take the medicine that Mr.|Faras gave you, mon!!

119.「だまらっしゃ～い！| ワシに作られた 魔法生物がッ！| 主人である ワシに 指: Shut up! I'm the one who created you magical|creatures! You dare order your master around!?

120.「クソぅ……何もかも ドミネウスのせいじゃ。| ワシから 仕事を！ 地位を！ 生: Damn... it's all Domineus' fault. My job! My|prestige! My reason for living! He took it all|away from me! It's all his fault!!

121.「いいかげんに するんだモンッ！| ドミネウスが クソだからって ご主人が| 腐: Enough, mon! Just because Domineus was a|bastard doesn't mean you have to waste away|the rest of your life, mon!

122.「ご主人を頼ってきた <pc>君や| メレアーデ君に チカラを貸してあげるモン！:
I'm here to lend a helping hand to| and Mr. Mereade, who have come|to depend on your husband! Don't let them|
|think that life sucks.

123.「そんな ムダなことをして ワシに| なんの得があると いうんじゃい！: What's in it for me by wasting my time like|that!

124.「損得の話じゃないモン！ 人生はクソだと| うつむいて 腐ってしまった人の救いと: It's not about profit, mon! I want my Master|back, the kind of Master who is the salvation|for the suffering and downtrodden, mon.

125.「ボクは また 従者として| ご主人を ほこりに思いたいんだモン！: I want be proud to be your servant again, mon!

127.「……フンッ！| たまには お前のカオを立ててやるか……。| 飲んでやるのじゃ！: ...Hmph! When I see your face like that...|Fine! I'll do it! I'll take this ungodly|bitter medicine!

128.ワグミカは 超苦い薬を クチに放り込み|甘々シロップで 飲み下した。: Wagmika popped the super bitter medicine into|her mouth and washed it down with the Sweet|Syrup.

129.間もなくして ワグミカの身体から|大量の汗とともに 毒素が排出された。: Soon, Wagmika's body expelled the toxins in a|deluge of sweat.

130.そして 手のふるえが おさまると|ワグミカは 錬金釜の前に立ち|難なく 地脈の結: And when the trembling in her hands subsided,|Wagmika stood before her Alchemy Pot and|effortlessly completed the Geode Crystal!

131.「見苦しいところを お見せしました。| こちらが ご所望の地脈の結晶です。: I'm sorry to have shown you something so|unsightly. Here is the Geode Crystal you|requested.

133.「何に使うか 知りませんが その道具は| 地脈エネルギーを吸い上げる 危険な代物: I don't know what you need it for, but it is a|dangerous tool that sucks up the energy of the|earth's veins. Please do not misuse it.

134.「ワグミカさんが 協力してくれて よかったわ。| さっそく ディアンジのもとへ|: I'm glad Ms. Wagmika decided to help us. Let's|go deliver the Geode Crystals to Dianji right|away.

136.「あの亀裂の はるか下に 水没の元凶が| エサ場にしている 地脈エネルギーの|: There is a Vein Point of geothermal energy far|below that crevice where the culprit of the|submergence is currently feeding.

137.「島にある ３か所のエサ場を失った 元凶は| 残された湧点……つまり この真下に: With the other Vein Points drained, this is|the only one left... meaning, our culprit will|definitely make their way here.

138.「へへへ。まあ 全部 クオード様の| 受け売りなんですけどね。: Hehehe. Well, it was all Master Quard's idea.

139.「そうそう。<cs_pchero>さん| 地脈の結晶を こちらに。: Oh, right. <cs_pchero>, hand me the Geode|Crystal.

141.「今から その元凶を おびき寄せます。| な～に どんな化け物が 飛び出してこよ: Now we'll lure out the fiend. No matter what|kind of monster might pop out, we are more|than prepared. Just sit back and watch!

142.「今ここにあるのは 地底のエサ場の| ３倍に相当する量の 地脈エネルギーなんです: There's now three times the amount of|geothermal energy here. There's no way it'll|be able to resist a meal like this...

143.「さあ 食いしん坊さん！| こっちに もっと も～っと| おいしいエサが ありま: Come on, you glutton! Come and get your just|desserts!

145.「でも 大丈夫ですよぉ。| ちゃ～んと 奥の手を 用意してますからねっ！: But don't worry. I've got a secret weapon up|my sleeve!

146.「ふぃ～。これにて 一件落着ですよぅ。| おふたりとも お疲れさまでした。: Phew! That takes care of that. Thank you both|for your hard work.

147.「それにしても これに封じた魔物……| どこかで 見覚えがあるんですよねぇ。|: By the way, the monster sealed in this jar...|looked kind of familiar. It looked like a|Wyrtle with three horns...

148.「そうですよぅ！ ヨンゲ所長の飼っていた| 魔法生物の メガロダイン…………ん？: That's right! Megalodyne, the magical creature|that Director Yong had... hmm?

149.「ひっ ひぇええええええっ！| どどど どおしましょうぉおおお！！| そそ 想定: E, eeeeekk!! W-w-what do we do!? This wasn't|supposed to happen!

150.「こうなったら いったん 引き返して| 援軍を呼んでくるしか……。: We're going to have to retreat and call for|reinforcements...

151.「そんなことしてたら 逃げられてしまうわ。| ここで 倒すしかないわよ！: If we do that, it'll get away. We have to take|it down here!

153.「あんな 凶暴なやつを しとめるなんて| さすがは <cs_pchero>さんで: Of course <cs_pchero> would be able to|take down such a ferocious foe.

154.「はぁはぁ……でも メレアーデ様まで| 戦うなんて……もし クオード様が知れば…: Haha...but if Master Quard found out that Lady|Mereade was fighting... he'd burst with anger.

155.「それは どうかしらね……。| あの子も私も もう 子供じゃないから。: I doubt it... we aren't children anymore.

156.「地脈エネルギーが 枯れた状態が続いてて| 大エテーネ島の地盤が 不安定になって:
The geothermal energy in the veins has dried|up and the ground in the Great Ethene Isle has|become unstable. That's what's causing this|
|earthquake.

157.「こうしては いられません！| 地脈の結晶に集めた エネルギーを| 至急 大地に: This isn't good! We have to return the energy|collected in the Geode Crystal to the land|right away!

158.「今 未来が変わったキュ！| どうやら この島が水没する未来を| 回避できたみた: The future changed just now! Looks like we've|averted a future where this island will be|flooded!

159.「ディアンジー！ 王都へ戻りましょう！| クオードが 吉報を待ってるわー。: Dianji! Let's go back to the Royal City!|Quard will be waiting for the good news!

161.「そのカオ……どうやら 水没の元凶を| 倒してくれたようだな。| ザグルフの直感: From the look on your face... I'd say you took|care of the source of the submersion. Zagulf's|intuition was right again.

163.「いいい以前は 感じられた 元凶の気配が| き…消えたので 黒曜の隕石孔まで行っ: I-I-I went to the Meteorite Hole to|investigate the s-s-source of the problem.

164.「……というわけだ。お前たちの| 晴れやかなカオと合わせて 考えれば| 計画の成: ...There you have it. Along with those bright|expressions on your faces, I'm convinced that|the plan was a complete success.

165.「ご報告の手間が はぶけたようですね。: Well, that saves me the trouble of making my|report.

166.「地震も ピタリとやんだし| 結晶に集めた 地脈エネルギーは| ちゃんと 大地に: The earthquakes have stopped, and the|geothermal energy collected in the Crystal was|returned, right?

168.「礼を言う お前たち。| エテーネの滅びは 無事 回避できた！: Thank you, all. The destruction of Ethene has|been averted!

169.「地の底にうごめく 元凶の存在に気付き| 居場所を特定したのは ザグルフだったな:
It was Zagulf who noticed that the source of|the problem was lurking underground and|pinpointed its location. Your observations|
|have saved us countless times.

171.「そして ディアンジ。計画に必要な| 数々の錬成物を よくぞ そろえてくれた。|:
And Dianji. You have done a great job of|preparing the many alchemicals necessary for|our plan. I thank you from the bottom of my|
|heart.

172.「私なぞ たいしたことは してませんよぅ。| そもそも 自力では 地脈の結晶を錬: I didn't do much. I couldn't even alchemise|the Geode Crystal by myself, and I had to rely|on <pc>...

173.「自分の至らないところを 素直に認め| 人を頼ってでも 成果をあげようとした。|: You honestly admitted to your own shortcomings|and achieved results, even if you had to rely|on others. I applaud your flexible judgment.

174.「うおーん うおーん。クオード様ぁ～！！ | そんな言葉を かけてもらえるなんて: Uwaah, uwaah! Master Quard~!! I'm so honored|you would say that~!

175.「それから……<pc>に 姉さん。| こんな俺の言葉を 信じてくれて ありがとう: And... <pc>, sis. Thank you for|trusting me.

176.「<pc>には 礼を 用意している。| ささやかだが 受け取ってくれ。: I have a thank you gift for <pc>.|It's not much, but please accept it.

177.「時見の箱に頼りきっていた 我が父……| ドミネウスがなしえなかった 滅びの回避:
We have averted the destruction that my father|Domineus, who relied so heavily on the|Timeseer Box, could not, by our own strength|
|alone!

178.「ここは 祝いの宴でも もうけたいところだが| お前には大事な用が あるんだった: I'd love to have a party to celebrate, but you|have something important to do, don't you?

179.「ディアンジ ザグルフ……さがってくれ。| あとで また 連絡する。: Dianji, Zagulf... you're dismissed. I'll|contact you later.

180.「さて……マデ神殿のことだがな。| 王宮消失にともない 古文書の大半が失われ|: Now... about Made Temple. With the loss of the|palace, most of the archives were lost, and it|took a lot of searching.

181.「このカギを 覚えているか <pc>。| いにしえの時代に封じられた マデ神殿の:
Do you remember this key, ? It|is said that the Liberator Door of Made|Temple, which was sealed in ancient times, can|
|be unlocked with this Timeseer's Key.

182.「こいつは 王家の秘奥に通ずるための| 王たる者の証。マデ神殿も また……| 秘:
It is the symbol of a king who has access to|the secrets of the royal family. Made Temple|is also one of the secrets of the royal|
|family.

183.「今回は 俺も同行する。これが 王としての| 最後の仕事に なるだろうからな……: This time I'm coming with you. This will be my|final duty as king...

184.「ティプローネ高地の 北西にある| マデ神殿の扉を 開きにいくぞ。: We're going to open the door to the Made|Temple, northwest of the Tiplone Highlands.

186.「幾度となく あなたを 導いてきたけれど| いつもいつも 思わせぶりなことしか|: I'm sorry I've misled you so many times, only|leaving you with cryptic words... I'm sorry...

187.「決定的なことを 伝えてしまうと| 正しい未来への道筋が 閉ざされてしまうかも|: But if I told you too much, then the path to a|righteous future might be lost to us...

188.「これで 最後になるというのに……| やっぱり たいしたことは 言えないわね。: I can't say more than this... but this will be|the last time.

189.「ひと目でも カオを見れて よかった。: It was nice to see you again, even if only for|a moment.

191.「これから 私は……| 最後の役目を まっとうするわ。: Now... I must fulfill my final task.

192.「この島に生きる すべての民を守り| エテーネの未来を 切りひらいてみせる。: I will protect all the people of Ethene, and|open the path to their future.

193.「……命に代えても 成功させてみせるわ。| それが 王家に生まれた者の つとめだ: I will succeed even if it costs me my life.|That's what a person born into royalty is|supposed to do.

194.「ふたりとも さようなら。| 願わくば 私たちの選ぶ道が| 正しき未来へと つな: Goodbye, you two. I hope that the path we have|chosen will lead us into a better future.

195.「キュロノスを倒して| 滅びの未来を 回避できたなら……| ボクたちは きっと: If we can defeat Kyuronos and avert a future|of destruction, I'm sure we will be reunited!

196.「<pc>を 信じるキュ！| ボクたちは 必ず キュロノスを倒すキュ！: Have faith in <pc>, kyu! We will|defeat Kyuronos, kyu!

197.「キュロノスを倒したら 迎えにきて。| ずっとずっと……待っているから。: When you defeat Kyuronos, come and find me.|I'll be waiting for you for as long as it|takes.

198.「あいつは……すべてを知ってしまった| メレアーデだったキュね……。: That... that was the Mereade who knows|everything, kyu...

199.「メレアーデにならって ボクたちも| なすべきことを まっとうするキュ！| 永久: We will follow Mereade's lead and do what we|must, kyu! We're going to the Royal City to|activate the Eternal Ring, kyu!

200.「先ほどの 声のぬしは 貴様だな？: That was you earlier, wasn't it?

202.「魔物ッ！ いや 魔法生物か！？: A monster! No, a magical creature!?

203.「やれやれ……。| 建国の祖の一角たる 偉人を相手に| 無礼きわまりない奴だキュ: Good grief... no manners to one of the great|founders of your nation, kyuree~.

204.「私の名は 漂流者キュレクス。| エテーネ王国 建国の祖たる| 初代国王レトリウ: My name is Castaway Kyurex. I was the best|friend of Retrius, the first king of Ethene|Kingdom, the founder of Ethene Kingdom.

205.「キュレクス…………だと？| つくなら もう少し ましなウソをつけ。| ７００年: Kyurex? If you're going to lie, you might as|well make it more convincing, because that|would make you over 700 years old.

206.「……そもそも キュレクスは人間のはずよ。: ...And Kyurex is supposed to be human.

207.「私は まごうことなき キュレクス本人。| アストルティアとは 異なる世界より来: I am, without a doubt, Kyurex. An otherworldly|lifeform from beyond Astoltia.

208.「ゆえに 人間よりも はるかに長寿キュレ。| かたや レトリウスの子孫は 着々と:
Hence, I have a much longer life span than|humans. Retrius' descendants, on the other|hand, have been steadily passing from|
|generation to generation, and you, Quard, are|the 50th.

209.「時見の箱に 心を奪われた 先王とちがい| お前は 時見に頼ることなく 迫る滅び:
Unlike your predecessor, whose heart was|stolen by the Timeseer Box, you've managed to|avoid imminent destruction without relying on|
|the Timeseer Box, kyure. I'm impressed.

211.「それにしても おもしろい姉弟だキュレ～。| 時渡りで 別々の時代へ流され それ: But still, you're quite the interesting pair.|Transported through time to different eras,|spending time in different places.

212.「なるほど。姉と弟で 生体継続時間が| 逆転してるのも 納得キュレ。: I see. It is understandable that the|biological gap of the sister and brother has|been reversed.

214.「そう言ってるキュレ。いい機会だから| 祖先に 都合のいい歴史を吹き込まれた|:
That's what I was saying, kyure. I'll take|this opportunity to teach you the true history|to you who were given a more... convenient|
|version.

215.「そもそも お前たちが宿す 時渡りのチカラは| 私が 朋友レトリウスに 分けあた:
First, the power of time travel that you|possess was inherited from my friend Retrius,|whom I bestowed it upon, and passed down to|
|his descendants.

216.「しかし 私は……人間を 見誤ったキュレ。| レトリウスが いかに 高潔な人物で: But I... had misjudged humans, kyure. However|noble Retrius may have been, the same could|not be said of his descendants...

217.「人間とは 世代をかさねる 生き物だと| 当時の私は 理解していなかったキュレ～: At the time, I was unaware that humans were a|species that reproduced across generations,|kyure.

218.「エテーネを築いた レトリウスは とっとと| 死んでいったキュレ……。残された:
Retrius, who built Ethene, died quickly,|leaving behind his children and grandchildren,|who turned to me to see into the future of the|
|Ethene Kingdom.

219.「そうして エテーネ王国は 私の時見を活用し| 自然災害や 飢饉による危機を回避:
And so the Ethene Kingdom, taking advantage of|my insight, averted crises caused by natural|disasters and famine, and soon became very|
|prosperous, kyure.

220.「しかし 最初こそ 神のごとく敬っていた私を| 祭司たち……レトリウスの子孫は:
The priests, descendants of Retrius, once|revered me as a god, but eventually, they|desired the power to see through time freely,|
|and turned on me, kyure.

221.「当時の祭司長は 錬金術で作った道具をもちいて| 私から 時見の源泉を奪った挙句: The chief priest of the time, using alchemical|tools, deprived me of the Timeseer Source, and|then sealed me in the Made Temple.

222.「その後 彼らは 私のチカラの源から| 物言わぬ 時見の能力だけを持った存在を|: After that, they created from the source of my|power a being with only the ability to see and|hear, and sealed it in the Timeseer Box, kyure.

224.「ご名答。そして 時見の箱と交信できるのは| 時渡りのチカラを 受け継ぐ| 建国:
Correct. And only those of the lineage of the|Founding King Retrius, who inherited the power|of time travel, can commune with the|
|Timeseer Box.

225.「私たちの祖先が そんな ひどいことを| おこなっていたなんて……。: I can't believe our ancestors did such a|terrible thing...

226.「返せるものなら その 時見の源泉を| お返ししたいのですが……王宮が消えた|: I would give back the Timeseer Source if I|could, but now that the palace is gone, it may|be lost...

227.「いいや まだ 存在しているキュレ。| この島の どこかから かつて私の一部だっ: No, it still exists, kyure. From somewhere on|this island, I feel the vibrations of the|Timeseer Source that was once a part of me.

228.「奪われた 時見の源泉は お前たちの| 言葉でいうと 球根みたいな形をしてるキュ: The stolen Timeseer Source is shaped like a|"bulb", in your language. Do you have any idea|what it looks like, kyure?

230.「前に <pc>と 王家の温室に行ったとき| 目にした 巨大な球根！| あれが: I saw a giant bulb the last time I was in the|Royal Hothouse with <pc>! Could|that be Mr. Kyurex's Timeseer Source?

231.「もし 時見の源泉を 返してくれたなら| お前たちが 行きたがっている| 時獄の: If you return the Timeseer Source to me, I|will allow you to go to the Time Prison, which|is where you want to go.

232.「きっと まちがいないわ！| 軍区画の転送の門から| 王家の温室に 行ってみまし: I'm sure I'm not wrong! Let's go to the Royal|Hothouse through the Relay Gate in the Army|Ward.

233.「おお……なつかしい この波動。| まごうことなき 時見の源泉キュレね。: Oh... how I remember this feeling. It truly is|the Timeseer Source, kyure.

234.「奪われていたものを 返されて| 礼を言うのも おかしな話キュレ。: It is passing strange to thank the ones who|took it from me in the first place, kyure.

235.「けれど 時見の源泉を奪ったのは| 遠い祖先のしわざで お前たちではないキュレ。: But it was the deeds of your ancestors that|took the Timeseer Source away from me, not|you, kyure. I thank you wholeheartedly.

236.「では さっそく いただくキュレ。: Now then, I'll be taking this, kyure.

238.「ブフィ～。ひさかたぶりに 真の姿を| 取り戻したキュレ！| かつてない 高ぶり: Ahh~! For the first time in ages, my true form|is restored, kyure! I feel incredible, kyure~!

239.「キュ～レ♪ キュレキュレ♪ キュ～レキュレ♪| ７００年ぶりの時見を ためして: Kyu~re♪ Kyurekyure♪ Kyu~rekyure♪ Let me try|looking through time for the first time in|700 years, kyure.

240.「キュレェ～ッ！ 見える！ 時が見える！！: Kyure~! I see it! I can see time!

241.「エテーネ王国は……間もなく……滅びる……。: The Ethene Kingdom... will soon... perish...

243.「どういうことですか？| 水没による滅亡なら 回避したはずです！: What do you mean? If you're talking about the|submersion, then we have already avoided it!

244.「お前たちは ７００年の 長きにわたり| 時見を くり返してきた……。: You have been looking back and forth through|time for 700 years...

245.「大津波 大飢饉 水没……| さまざまな災厄を 避けてきたが| それは 運命を歪: Tsunamis, famine, submergence... you have|avoided all sorts of calamities, but that|only distorts destiny.

246.「運命を変える……その度に 歪みは増大し| 回避した幾多の災厄は 束ねられ| よ: Each time destiny is altered, the distortions|grow, and the many disasters averted will|coalesce into an even greater disaster.

249.「見てのとおり 隕石の落下で 滅ぶ未来キュレ。| 王都を守る 守護障壁があろうと:
As you saw, the future will be one of|destruction by a falling meteorite. Even with|the protective barrier around the Royal City,|
|it cannot be stopped, kyure.

250.「ふざけるなッ！ 俺たちのやったことが| 無意味だったとでも 言うのかッ！？: Don't screw with me! Are you saying that|everything we've done until now was for|nothing!?

251.「この ペテン師めッ！| どうせ 妖しげな術で 幻覚を見せただけだ！| お前の時: You charlatan! That was just an illusion you|conjured with your magic! Who would ever|believe something so ridiculous!?

253.「……やれやれ。せっかちな奴だキュレ。| でも お前たちは 動じていないキュレね: Good grief, such an impatient fellow, kyure.|But you guys are completely unfazed, kyure.

254.「あなたが 真の時見の使い手なら| 隕石による滅びをも 回避する未来を| 見せら: If you truly are a master of time seeing, you|can show us a future in which the destruction|from the meteorite is averted... can't you?

255.「たとえ 回避したそばから 次の滅びが| おそってきたとしても……私たちは 黙っ: We cannot just sit back and accept the next|destruction, not when we just averted the|previous one!

256.「ブッフォオオオオーッ！！| キモのすわった 奴だキュレ。お前からは| 確かに: Buufoooh! You're a bold one, kyure. I can|certainly see Retrius' blood flowing through|you, kyure.

257.「そんな お前には 隕石落下を阻止する| とっておきの秘策を さずけてやるキュレ: I'll give you a secret plan to stop the|meteorite from falling on you.

258.「ぜひ お願いします！: Yes, by all means, please do!

259.「王都キィンベルの 中央広場には| 永久時環と名付けられた 砂時計のような| 建: Do you know of the Eternal Ring, the|hourglass-like structure in the central plaza|of Royal City Kimbel, kyure?

260.「永久時環は ただの芸術作品ではないキュレ。| 空中に散らばる 微量な時渡りのチ: The Eternal Ring is not just some sculpture.|It is a device that absorbs and stores time|travel power scattered in the air, kyure.

261.「かつて レトリウスと 腹心のユマテルという| 錬金術師が 子孫が起こすであろう:
Retrius and his consort, an alchemist named|Umater, built it in anticipation of the|mistakes that would be made by their|
|descendants, kyure.

262.「……あいつらは たいした知恵者だったキュレ。| 永久時環を用いれば 隕石という: ...They were very clever, I must say. With the|Eternal Ring, even the calamity of an incoming|meteorite would be nothing, kyure.

263.「ただし 永久時環を 起動させるには| レトリウスの血をひく者……: However, only someone who carries Retrius'|blood can activate the Eternal Ring...

264.「ここを出て 右手の通路を進めば| マデ氏族の叡智が眠る 祭具棟と呼ばれる場所に:
If you leave here and follow the passage on|your right, you will reach a place called the|ritual building, where the wisdom of the Made|
|clan rests.

265.「まず 祭具棟へ行って 花のリストレットを探し| それを身につけて 戻ってくるキ: First, find the flower wristlet inside the|ritual building, put it on, and come back|here. We'll continue our discussion then.

266.「おお！ 戻ってきたキュレね。| 花のリストレットは 見つけたキュレ？: Oh! You're back, kyure. Did you find the|flower wristlet?

267.「さっそく 永久時環の起動法を| 伝授するキュレ。もっと そばに来るキュレ。: I will now instruct you on how to activate the|Eternal Ring. Come closer, kyure.

268.「脳に直接 大量の情報を送るから| ちょ～っと 具合が 悪くなるかもしれないけど: I'll be sending a lot of information directly|to your brain, so you might feel a bit ill,|but you'll just have to tough it out, kyure!

270.「……私が チカラを取り戻したのを| キュロノスに 感知されたようキュレ。: Kyuronos must have sensed that I regained my|strength, kyure.

271.「私は 正しき時の流れの 守護者。: I am the guardian of the righteous flow of|time.

272.「来たるべき未来を さまたげんとする者よ。| キュロノスの裁きを 受けよ！: Let those who would impede the coming of the|proper future be judged by Kyuronos!

273.<center>貴様が キュレクス……。|我が祖にして 同等の能力をもつ個体。: You are Kyurex... my progenitor, and one of|equal ability to mine.

274.<center>なんと ちっぽけな。|失望を 禁じ得ない……。: How small and insignificant. I can't help but|be disappointed...

275.<center>なれど 貴様の存在を許したとあれば|雑音なき世界を到来させる さ: But if I allow you to exist, you will be a|hindrance to the coming of a world without|noise.

276.「あわれな……。時見を通じ 幾度となく| 人間たちの闇を 直視し続けた果てに|: How pitiful... having been exposed to the|darker nature of man time and time again, you|yourself have become distorted, kyure.

277.「さわがしいキュ！ 安眠妨害っキュよ！: It's too noisy, kyu! You're interrupting my|nap, kyu!

278.「キュキュキュキュ！？| 何が どうなってるキュ！？: Kyukyukyukyu!? What's going on here, kyu!?

281.<center>邪魔者は 排除した。|残るは……時の異分子に協力する|同祖の個体: An obstacle has been removed. All that remains|now is the other one that aids the interloper|of time...

282.<center>なれど 時見すらできぬ 未熟な個体など|手を下すに 値せず。: But one who cannot even see through time is|not even worth my effort.

283.<center>我こそは 唯一無二の 時の支配者。|ならぶ者なき 究極の存在。: I am the one and only ruler of time. The|ultimate existence without equal.

285.「もう 間にあわないキュレ……| それより 小さき者よ……私のそばに……。: It's too late for me, kyure... more|importantly... little one, come closer...

286.「ボクのことは キュルルと呼ぶキュ。| ……お前を見てると モヤモヤするんだけど: My name's Kyururu, kyu... When I look at you,|I get this strange sensation... just who are|you anyway, kyu?

287.「その様子だと……私のことはおろか| 自分が何者かも 理解していないキュレね。|: From your reaction... you don't even know who|you really are, let alone who I am, kyure.|Quickly, now... take my hand...

288.「なるほど……お前もまた| 私のチカラの源から 分化した存在……。: I see... you were also born from the source of|my power...

289.「それって 親子みたいなものキュ？: You mean like parent and child, kyu?

290.「親子という概念には 当てはまらないキュレ。| 私たちは 同一にして 異質なる存:
The concept of parent and child does not apply|to us, kyure. We are the same, yet different|beings... a lifeform from another world,|
|wandering across the Spacetime Gap...

291.「もう 時間がないキュレ……。| キュルル……お前に 私の……| 知識と能力のす: We are running out of time, kyure...|Kyururu... I will give you all of my knowledge|and abilities.

293.「……おかしいキュ。| む…胸が……胸が 苦しいキュ！| シクシクと 痛みが 消: ...It's strange, kyu. My chest... my chest|hurts, kyu! The pain won't go away, kyu.

294.「……彼の死を 悲しいと感じてるからよ。| あなたにとって キュレクスさんが|: ...It's because you feel sad about his death.|It shows how important Mr. Kyurex was to you.

295.「たった今 出会ったばかりの相手に| 調子を狂わされるなんて 理解不能キュ。|: I can't understand how someone I only just met|could make me feel that way, kyu. I'm sure|I'll get over it in no time, kyu.

296.「アイツから 受け取った知識に 永久時環の| 起動のしかたがあったキュ！ 隕石落:
The knowledge I received from him was how to|activate the Eternal Ring, kyu! If you want to|avoid a future full of falling meteorites,|
|you'd better hurry, kyu.

297.「……わかったわ。王都の広場にある| 永久時環を 動かしにいきましょう。: Okay. Let's go activate the Eternal Ring in|the plaza of the Royal City.

298.「メレアーデよ お前が 資格者の証を| 身につける必要があるキュレ。お前からは|: Mereade, you have the qualifications needed. I|sense the blood of Retrius is strongest within|you, kyure.

299.「水没する未来を 回避したことによって| より 大きな災厄が おそってくるキュレ: The avoidance of the future of submersion has|given way to an even greater calamity, kyure.
